data.title: Black Food Truck Festival
data.meta_description: The Black Food Truck Festival is an annual family event held in Charleston, South Carolina featuring the finest food trucks and entertainment across the country.
data.text:
The BFTF Experience

The Black Food Truck Festival is a family-oriented event featuring the finest food trucks in the region in Charleston, South Carolina. Our mission is to make an economic and social impact on the community by showcasing and investing in area Black-owned businesses.

“…you'll find a street dining experience with offerings that appeal to both adults and kids.”

-TRIP ADVISOR

“There is nothing better than good food, good music and good company. The [annual] Black Food Truck Festival in Charleston, South Carolina, is fast approaching and offers all three.”

-CUISINE NOIR MAGAZINE

“There are so many different subsets of minority-owned business that we are able to touch, so not only are we creating an economic impact in the community, we are also bringing the community together.”

-FOUNDER, Marcus Hammond

A Family Affair

The Black Food Truck Festival is the ultimate family reunion, featuring kid-friendly activities in a safe, secure environment. Expect to enjoy a range of cuisines while enjoying live music and DJ performances. Come celebrate with us and have a great time while creating memories to last a lifetime!

The Experience

The Black Food Truck Festival is dedicated to providing a unique experience for our attendees. We want you to spend the weekend having a great time and celebrating Black culture.

The Cuisine

We have over 40 food trucks and vendors creating various flavors for your palate. From African-American soul food dishes to West African cuisines, you will experience the best dishes in the region.

The Music

Since the inception of the Black Food Truck Festival, the music has taken on its own identity. We invite musicians and bands from across the Southeast to bring you a live musical experience like no other.
